鶷鶷鶷

鶷字的基本解释

鶷
xiá
〔鶷??（
y?）〕ａ．百舌鸟，似伯劳而较小。ｂ．白头乌，一种鸟，似乌鸦而比乌鸦大，颈项白色。

鶷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《廣韻》胡瞎切，入鎋，匣。］
见“鶷”。

鶷字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶷； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1496第25
【廣韻】胡瞎切【集韻】下瞎切，?音轄。鶷?，鳥名。【字林】鶷?似伯勞而小。又鶷?卽反舌鳥也。【李時珍曰】百舌，狀如雊?而小，身略長，灰黑色，微有斑點，喙亦尖黑，行則頭俯。【謝靈運·山居賦】雞鵲繡質，鶷鸐綬章。又【集韻】何葛切，音曷。義同。

鶷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶷字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
xiá
〔鶷?? (
y?)] a. Mockingbird, like a shrike but smaller. b. The Bald Crow, a bird, resembles a crow but larger than a crow, with a white neck.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Guangyun" Hu blindly cut, enter the horse, box. ]
See "鶷".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶷; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1496 Page 25
[Guang Yun] Hu blindly cut [Ji Yun] blindly cut under,? Yin administers.鶷?, the name of the bird. [Word Lin] 鶷? Like a shrike but small. What a shame? [Li Shizhen said] Hundred tongues, shaped like a gu? But small, slightly longer, gray-black, slightly spotted, and black beak. 【Xie Lingyun·Shanju Fu】The embroidery quality of chicken and magpie, 鶷鸐縐維章. Also 【Jiyun】He Geqie, Yinhao. The same meaning.
